name: SYFTKOG
tag_list: computer-repair, technical-support, web-design, web-development, apple, fix, trouble-shoot
overview:
SYFTKOG:.Is a full service PC , MAC repair or upgrade service center.We provide in home,in office and off site computer services .We offer services in Spotsylvania, Fredericksburg,Stafford,Northern Virginia (not all area’s in N.Virginia contact us for details).

Mission Statement: We aim to provide high quality service for a fair market price,without hype . To our customer in the area’s of Information technology

  1. computer repair,
  2. networking,
  3. programing,
  4. configuration,
  5. data access

At the same time promoting high ethical standards and sound Biblical principles. We have worked in many sectors in the area’s of :

  • Corporations
  • Retail,
  • Finance
  • Private and Non-Profit organizations.
